entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Tadoule Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow late this evening and overnight. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 07 January 2023
